document.full_text: increasingly aggressive property appraisals, so-called "incentive management fees" for hotel properties, and the limited return of "pro forma" underwriting are among the troubling trends that standard & poor's cites as red flags in the quickly evolving revival of the commercial mortgage-backed security market.
document.title: s&p identifies troubling trends in cmbs market
lines_and_colors: increasingly aggressive property appraisals, so-called "incentive management fees" for hotel properties, and the limited return of "pro forma" underwriting are among the troubling trends that standard & poor's cites as red flags in the quickly evolving revival of the commercial mortgage-backed security market.
